name: Iris
introduce: Iris is a decentralized social media network enabling creators to share video content on the Lens Protocol, with additional livestream capabilities. Users can share content publicly, or choose to share to only loyal followers. This allows a user's public posts to be found organically on Lens/Iris, while still being able to post exclusive posts for their followers. Users must pay a subscription price to follow creators, and creators have the ability to set the subscription price.
